梩字的基本解释

梩
sì
古同“耜”，古代锹、臿一类的农具，后指犁上的铧。

梩
qǐ
古同“杞”，枸杞。

梩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》里之切，平之，來。］
锹锸一类的起土用具。

梩字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梩； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页530第13
【唐韻】里之切【集韻】陵之切【正韻】鄰之切，?音釐。【廣韻】徙土轝也。【周禮·地官·鄕師註】梩或云揷，或云鍬。【孟子】虆梩。【註】籠?之類。【司馬法】周輜輦載梩。【揚子·方言】沅湘之閒謂之畚，東齊謂之梩。　又【集韻】象齒切【韻會】詳里切，?同㭒。㭒或从里，?也。　又【類篇】莊皆切，音齋。木名。　又【廣韻】都皆切，音諧。義同。　又【集韻】口已切。同杞。卽枸杞也。杞或从里。

梩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
梩字的起名意思

暂无。

梩
Basic explanation of words
梩
sì
In ancient times, it is the same as "耜", ancient farm tools such as shovel and shovel, and later refers to the shank on the plow.
梩
qǐ
Ancient with "qi", wolfberry.
梩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
[The cut in "Guangyun", the level, come. ]
Earthenware such as spade.
梩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梩; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 530 and 13
[Tang Yun] Cut from the inside [Ji Yun] Cut from the Tomb [Zheng Yun] Cut from the neighbor,? Yin Li. 【Guangyun】Migrating to the soil. 【Zhou Li·Di Guan·Feng Shi Note】Ping or Yun Sha, or Yun Shovel. 【Mencius】Qiaobang. [Note] Cage? and the like. [Sima Law] Zhou Yuyin set the stage. [Yangtze Dialect] The leisure in Yuanxiang is called 畚, and the Eastern Qi is called 梩.　[Jiyun] Xiangtooth cut [Yunhui] in detail,? Same as 㭒.㭒 or from inside, also.　[Classes] Zhuang Jieqie, Yinzhai. Wooden name.　 [Guang Yun] are all cut, the sound is harmonious. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The mouth has been cut. Tongqi. Lycium barbarum also. Qi or from inside.
梩
